name: Echo Tokyo: Reaper
description:
Explore Echo Tokyo where you will meet and interact with a variety of characters as you pursue your investigation.

Game Features

  • Takes place in a cyberpunk world
  • A light visual novel style storyline
  • Multiple choices to make that affect the story
  • Multiple good and bad ending to unlock
  • Sexy Illustrations and Video Gallery
  • Exquisitely illustrated and animated H-scenes and CGs
